languages.text: {n}Из ослепительно гротескного фонтана течет темно-бордовый амасек. Виночерпий услужливо преподносит наполненный до краев кубок.{/n} "Извольте отведать, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Сей урожай зрел с тех пор, как был заложен первый камень нашей твердыни — мы раскупорили его, чтобы восславить вас".

{n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the ridiculously gaudy fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a goblet filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."
languages.original_text: {n}Из ослепительно гротескного фонтана течет темно-бордовый амасек. Виночерпий услужливо преподносит наполненный до краев кубок.{/n} "Извольте отведать, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Сей урожай зрел с тех пор, как был заложен первый камень нашей твердыни — мы раскупорили его, чтобы восславить вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the spectacularly absurd fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a cup filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we had laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We broached it to celebrate you."

{n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the spectacularly absurd fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a cup filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we had laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We broached it to celebrate you."

This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."

This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."

{n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the ridiculously gaudy fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a goblet filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."

languages.text: {n}花哨、俗艳的喷泉中，喷出了深栗色的艾玛赛克酒。一位热心的侍者将装满艾玛赛克酒的高脚杯递给了你。{/n}“请您尝尝吧，来自上界的大人！这些美酒自从这座城堡落成之日起，就一直储藏在酒窖里。今天，我们打开这批美酒，专程庆祝您的到来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the ridiculously gaudy fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a goblet filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."

traits.locale_text: {n}花哨、俗艳的喷泉中，喷出了深栗色的艾玛赛克酒。一位热心的侍者将装满艾玛赛克酒的高脚杯递给了你。{/n}“请您尝尝吧，来自上界的大人！这些美酒自从这座城堡落成之日起，就一直储藏在酒窖里。今天，我们打开这批美酒，专程庆祝您的到来。”

languages.text: {n}ばかばかしいほど派手な噴水から、濃いえんじ色のアマセックが流れ出ていた。熱心な給仕が、なみなみと注がれたゴブレットをあなたに差し出した。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、どうぞ味見してください！このヴィンテージは、私たちが城塞の礎石を据えた時からずっと熟成されてきたものです。あなた様をお祝いするために、この酒樽を開けたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the ridiculously gaudy fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a goblet filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ばかばかしいほど派手な噴水から、濃いえんじ色のアマセックが流れ出ていた。熱心な給仕が、なみなみと注がれたゴブレットをあなたに差し出した。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、どうぞ味見してください！このヴィンテージは、私たちが城塞の礎石を据えた時からずっと熟成されてきたものです。あなた様をお祝いするために、この酒樽を開けたのです」

languages.text: {n}Un chorro de amasec color granate oscuro mana de la ridículamente ostentosa fuente. Un paje muy solícito te entrega una copa llena hasta el borde.{/n} «¡Cátelo si le place, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! Esta añada lleva madurando desde que sentamos los cimientos de nuestra ciudadela. La hemos descorchado en honor a su persona».
languages.original_text: {n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the ridiculously gaudy fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a goblet filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un chorro de amasec color granate oscuro mana de la ridículamente ostentosa fuente. Un paje muy solícito te entrega una copa llena hasta el borde.{/n} «¡Cátelo si le place, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! Esta añada lleva madurando desde que sentamos los cimientos de nuestra ciudadela. La hemos descorchado en honor a su persona».

languages.text: {n}Gülünç derecede şatafatlı çeşmeden vişneçürüğü renginde amasek akıyor. Hevesli bir saki, ağzına kadar dolu bir kadehi sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Lütfedip tadına bakın Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}! Bu rekolte, kalemizin temel taşını koyduğumuzdan beri olgunlaşmaktaydı. Sizin şerefinize açtık."
languages.original_text: {n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the ridiculously gaudy fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a goblet filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gülünç derecede şatafatlı çeşmeden vişneçürüğü renginde amasek akıyor. Hevesli bir saki, ağzına kadar dolu bir kadehi sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Lütfedip tadına bakın Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}! Bu rekolte, kalemizin temel taşını koyduğumuzdan beri olgunlaşmaktaydı. Sizin şerefinize açtık."

languages.text: {n}De l'amasec d'un rouge sombre se déverse de la fontaine incroyablement tape-à-l'œil, tandis qu'un échanson enthousiaste vous tend un gobelet rempli à ras bord.{/n} « Je vous en prie, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, goûtez donc. Ce millésime vieillit depuis que nous avons posé la pierre angulaire de notre citadelle. Nous l'avons mis en perce pour vous rendre hommage. »
languages.original_text: {n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the ridiculously gaudy fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a goblet filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."

traits.locale_text: {n}De l'amasec d'un rouge sombre se déverse de la fontaine incroyablement tape-à-l'œil, tandis qu'un échanson enthousiaste vous tend un gobelet rempli à ras bord.{/n} « Je vous en prie, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, goûtez donc. Ce millésime vieillit depuis que nous avons posé la pierre angulaire de notre citadelle. Nous l'avons mis en perce pour vous rendre hommage. »

languages.text: {n}Dunkelbrauner Amasec fließt aus einem lächerlich kitschigen Brunnen. Ein dienstbeflissener Mundschenk reicht dir einen randvollen Becher.{/n} "Trinkt einen Schluck, wenn es Euch gefällt {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}! Dieser Jahrgang ist seit der Grundsteinlegung unserer Zitadelle gereift. Wir haben ihn Euch zu Ehren angezapft."
languages.original_text: {n}Dark-maroon amasec is pouring out of the ridiculously gaudy fountain. An eager cup-bearer hands you a goblet filled to the brim.{/n} "Have a taste, if you please, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! This vintage had been maturing ever since we laid the cornerstone of our citadel. We tapped it to celebrate you."
